mapper.select:
SELECT pg.id groupId, pg.name groupName, ps.id propsId, ps.name propsName, pp.is_sale isSale, p.product_type productType from p_product_property pp INNER JOIN p_props_group pg on pp.group_id=pg.id INNER JOIN p_props ps on pp.property_id=ps.id INNER JOIN p_product p on p.product_code=pp.product_code
and pp.product_code=#{productCode}
